mapper.select:
SELECT u.`name`, u.idcard AS idCard, u.phone, u.njcommunity as community, u.currentaddress as address, u.arrivedate as arrivalDate, u.remark as trackingRemark, u.ifwh as arrivalEpidemicArea, u.whtime as arrivalEpidemicAreaDate, u.livetype as resideResult, u.jdname as streetLeader, u.jdphone as streetLeaderPhone, u.gbname as streetCadre, u.gbphone as streetCadrePhone, u.sgname as communityWorker, u.sgphone as communityWorkerPhone, u.mjname as communityPolice, u.mjphone as communityPolicePhone, u.ylname as medicalPersonnel, u.ylphone as medicalPersonnelPhone FROM whuser u WHERE u.modifytime < #{endTime}
AND u.modifytime >= #{startTime}

SELECT u.`name`, u.idcard AS idCard, u.phone, u.community AS community, u.liveaddress AS address, u.arrivedate AS arrivalDate, u.remark AS trackingRemark, CONCAT_WS( "/", u.province, u.city, u.district ) AS fromRegion FROM outsideuser u WHERE u.modifytime < #{endTime}
AND u.modifytime >= #{startTime}

AND uc.signtime >= #{startTime}
